body.p: Although the source is freely available for download, The Grinder CVS archive is currently not public. Patches are individually reviewed and applied by Philip Aston.

If you feel you have something worth sharing, please send patches to the grinder-development list. Ideally patches should be in 'unified diff' (diff -u) format against the latest released version of The Grinder 3. Patches should also include updates to the relevant documentation sources. Please include a statement that you are happy for you work to be distributed under the terms of The Grinder license.

Please pay attention to the existing coding style of The Grinder. There is a Checkstyle properties file in etc which you should use to check the formatting of your code. (Not all packages are yet compliant, but any newly edited files should be). This not only helps to make the code readable, but makes applying patches a much nicer experience.
